testcase.classname: Check NHS costs for person from Wales
testcase.name: Verify if user is below 16 years old, he must get help with NHS Costs
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to URL "https://services.nhsbsa.nhs.uk/check-for-help-paying-nhs-costs/start".passed Then user is navigated to NHS page -Check what help you could get to pay for NHS costs - NHSBSA.passed When User click on Start Now................................................passed And user Select the country as Wales........................................passed And user click on Next Button...............................................passed Then user is navigated to What is your date of birth? -Check what help you could get to pay for NHS costs - NHSBSA" page..passed When user enter day as "20".................................................passed And user enter month as "05"................................................passed And user enter year as "2010"...............................................passed And user click on Next Button...............................................passed Then user see the success message - Based on what you've told us, You get help with NHS costs.passed And he can view list of all the free benefits he is eligible for............passed
